title: Accessibility Analysis for Inclusive Urban Planning
name: accessibility_analysis_v1
description: This use case focuses on analyzing public facility accessibility in Melbourne using datasets for metro train stations, public toilets, and footpath steepness. The goal is to identify underserved areas, propose actionable recommendations, and visualize insights using interactive maps.
expected_output: Dynamic maps highlighting underserved areas, accessible public facilities, and high-risk footpaths, along with visualizations and actionable recommendations for improving accessibility.
